desc: 30% all parameters, raises Atk limit to 170000, 120% critical damage, probable damage reduction to 1 & 100% Atk for 2 turns when damage dealt is over 300000
lore:
A pulsing coreâ€”all that remains of Ascha, the Devourer.

The core's oppressive aura is enough to overwhelm most people several times over. Much like the Devourer, it appears to passively siphon energy from its surroundings, and those careless enough to remain too long in its vicinity end up in a comatose state.
name: Liminal End
